Matrix Environment.Matrix Example: \begin{pmatrix} a & b & c \\ d & e & f \end{pmatrix}

Array Environment.Array 1: \left( \begin{array}{ccc} a & b & c \\ d & e & f \\ g & h & i \end{array} \right)

Examples.General m x n Matrix: A = a_{ij} = \left( \begin{array}{cccc} a_{11} & a_{12} & \ldots & a_{1n} \\ a_{21} & a_{22} & \ldots & a_{2n} \\ \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\ a_{m1} & a_{m2} & \ldots & a_{mn} \end{array} \right)
Examples.Partitioned Matrix: \left(\begin{array}{c|cc} a & b & c \\ \hline d & e & f \\ g & h & i \end{array} \right)

Other.Transpose Matrix: \left(\begin{array}{ccc} a & b & c\\ d & e & f\end{array}\right)^{\mathrm{T}} =\left(\begin{array}{cc} a & d \\ b & e \\ c & f \end{array}\right)

Matrix Operations.Determinant: \mathrm{det} A = \begin{vmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{vmatrix} = ad - bc
